class_notes: PUBH 500 is a fully asynchronous, self-administered online module. No synchronous sessions are required. It will take approximately 4-5 hours to complete.
course_description: 1 hour online module addressing 4 of the 12 CEPH required Foundational Knowledge items. The module will begin with an introduction to a "Public Health Perspective followed by the 4 items of foundational knowledge.
